alert.note: Alert for Bucks; Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 12:30PM EDT until July 25 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MONTGOMERY AND NORTHWESTERN BUCKS COUNTIES... At 1229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Quakertown, or 15 miles south of Allentown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Quakertown, Perkasie, Souderton, East Greenville, Green Lane, Geryville, Telford, Sellersville, Pennsburg, Red Hill, Richlandtown, Trumbauersville and Silverdale. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 34 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
